name: rofl
actor_no_arg: You roll on the floor, laughing hysterically.
others_no_arg: $n falls to the ground and rolls around laughing hysterically.
actor_found_target: You fall to the floor laughing at $N's remark.
others_found: $n rolls on the floor laughing at $N's antics!
target_found: $n rolls on the floor laughing at your antics!
others_auto: $n falls over laughing at $e own antics.
